channel.title: Changing The Title Of A Client
channel.description: I recently got a client, but I want to change the title, so it is not leached. I removed and added things to the client, but I can't change the title of the window. How do I do this??

item.title: Changing The Title Of A Client
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

It will still be leeched if you change the name… That’s basically leeching.

And you’d change it in the client class of the client.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Title Of A Client

item.title: Changing The Title Of A Client
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Go to run.bat, right click edit, there is a name there.

Go to client.java

Do Ctrl + F

Type in Setserver IF NOT

Type in the name of the client (Ex: Fallout (not yours))

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Title Of A Client
